info.description:
pos-proxy acts as the backend for POS module in the localnetwork
it handles all the POS operations also handles the offline mode
scenarios
info.title: pos-proxy api

get.description: in case of proxy always returns true
returns a list of menu courses
returns details of a Course
returns a list of fixed discounts for a store
returns an object of a FixedDiscount based on ID

put.description: updates a fixed discount based on ID

delete.description:
deletes a fixed discount by id from mongodb
then proxy the request to the backend

get.description:
retrieves list of settled or open invoices
the settled invoices are being proxied to backend.
the result is returned in a paginated style

post.description: creates a new invoice or update an old one

loops over list of invoices, creates or updates
them, then release the terminal that is locked.
moves the selected invoices from table to another table
takes a map of values and proxy it to backend in order to create ej for payment
sends invoice lineitems to FDM and increase printing counter
pay the invoice and settle it as house use

handles the refund scenario and cancel postings.
Creating a new invoice with the canceled postings.

get.description: fetches invoice from the database by invoice number

post.description: cancels payments of a paid invocie based on postings frontend ids
creates pospayments and pospostinginformations on invoice
gets the invoice and checks if it's locked or not

get.description:
removes invoice_number key from redis and make
the invoice available to be picked up again by cashiers

post.description: closes invoice and sets the void reason

get.description: returns a list of printers
returns a list of printer settings
returns a list of POS stores
returns a POS store data based on ID
returns a POS stores details based on ID
returns a list of POS tables
returns a details of a table by id

post.description: returns a list of unsettled invoices (with full details) on a table at the moment.

get.description: returns a details of a table by table number

returns a json response with list of terminals,
could be queries by store
returns a json response with the specified terminal id

post.description:
removes the terminal redis key and make the terminal
available for other cashiers again

get.description: returns a list of permissions assigned for the logged in user

post.description:
logs out a cashier and create a clockout record in the attendance sheet
returns a 200 success with true as body

used to clockin a cashier and compare his
pin against the correct one from the database

get.description: returns a list with available currencies

returns a details of a currency by id

Paramters:
+ name: id
in: path
required: true
schema:
type: integer
returns a list of income departments
returns a details of a department by id

return a json http response contains list of
permissions assigned to a certain cashier
returns a success message if the proxy is working properly.
returns the version of the proxy
returns the current audit date of the instance
returns the current audit date of the instance

AppliedDiscount.description: AppliedDiscount maps a discount of posinvoicelineitem

GroupedAppliedDiscount.description:
GroupedAppliedDiscount represents a group of applied discounts grouped
by vat code

ObjectId.title:
ObjectId is a unique ID identifying a BSON value. It must be exactly 12 bytes
long. MongoDB objects by default have such a property set in their "_id"
property.

POSLineItem.description: POSLineItem maps POSInvoiceLineItem of the backend

lockedposinvoices.description: flag that shows if the invoices on these table are currently locked or not

terminal.description: ID of the terminal that is currently locking these invoices

invoiceLite.description: InvoiceLite represents the Invoice model in a list

is_settled.description: determines if the invoice is open or settled

invoicePOSTRequest.description:
InvoicePOSTRequest is a model for requests that comes from POST requests
to make actions on invocies

last_invoice_id.description: last number used to generate invoice_number for new invoices

number.description: unique number users see to identify a Terminal

rcrs_number.description: the license number set by the Belgian government

store.description: ID of the store the terminal is linked too
